Precompiled Binaries for windows, macosx and linux.

= Introduction =

It's now possible to download Precompiled Binaries from the openmalaria repository.

= Details =
  * _*Windows:*_
  _You will need to have windows visual studio or visual express installed._

  http://openmalaria.googlecode.com/svn/download/win32/
  * _*MACOSX:*_
  http://openmalaria.googlecode.com/svn/download/macosx/
  * _*LINUX(X86):*_
  http://openmalaria.googlecode.com/svn/download/linux32/

Some example files are available at this address:

http://openmalaria.googlecode.com/svn/download/examples/
